values: If something is metropolitan, it relates to a large city.
After years of living on a farm, Rufu was finally moving to a metropolitan area.
adj. 大都市的；大主教辖区的；宗主国的

- adj. 大都会的, 大城市的
- 中心地区的, 正宗的
